summary: Adds more guards to Riverwood and Rorikstead
descriptionHtml:
I've downloaded some mods that increase the amount of enemies in the game to make it more challenging. However three guards are no match when a squad of 8 vampires wander into town. So in order to protect the villager population I'm making mods that add more of the generic guards and soldiers to Skyrim. I started with Whiterun Hold. I hope to start the Rift after I'm finished.
I still need to add more guards to the area outside of Whiterun. I also need to test the mod with the civil war quest line.

If there are bugs let me know. This isn't my first mod but I'm still very to this.
author: Stripes251
